channel.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
channel.description:
ive been haveing a really bad problem with run.bat with 525's i own a 508 and i can compile i am fimmalir with jdk and jre but i dont get the new rs2hd 525s and no one will help me so im willing to give a lvl 115 rs acc with 99 wc 99str 99def with a ss and santa hat and full torag and memy hes not muted heres some pics of my problems
Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. 'server' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
or sometimes when i remove the -Xmx1024m from run.bat this error: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/25pljk2.jpg[/img] if u cant see pic heres another 1 right after [code][2009/04/17 17:15:17] [GameEngine]: Loading item definitions...[/code] i get a pop up of like 3000 things says error java PLZ HELP I ASURE U THE ACC and if u need any thing from u just ask ill be glad to make it memy when it runs out some awsnsewers that need more help:
go into run.bat and put in ur java
umm how? like what wheres my java where do insert it i have jdk1_6_11 my run.bat looks like this
@echo off title JC-SCAPE 525 java -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main server is now online pause
plz help :( i would luv u forever XD and tell me about where do i insert my jdk or java type plz ty :) :confused:

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @friendscapev3 friendscapev3
item.description:
@friendscapev3 wrote:

i alrdy fixed it i had to go into java incontrol panel and update -Xmx512m

with my jre6 but ty all for helping

Read full topic

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Reference your classpath correctly.

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Umm, “server is now online” is not the correct way to output a message in a batch file.

Try the echo command:

echo Server is now online.

Read full topic

@whymeman wrote:

Try looking for either one!!!

What source are u using or did u make it?

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @friendscapev3 friendscapev3
item.description:
@friendscapev3 wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @whymeman whymeman
item.description:
@whymeman wrote:

ummm. i think ur run.bat is wrong here is a good code

@echo off
title server name goes here
color 0c

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server name goes here…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server name goes herer…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server
pause

Read full topic

http://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u13-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

Then go to http://www.java.com/

And then download it.

And change ‘server’ to run

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @friendscapev3 friendscapev3
item.description:
@friendscapev3 wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:5, topic:274074”][quote author=friendscapev3 link=topic=362145.msg2752931#msg2752931 date=1240013913]

Just take your 508 run.bat and replace the contents of your 508 run.bat into your 525 run.bat
[/quote]that is the dumbest ansewer in the world… maybe that works with dumb 317 but doesnt work with 525 or 508…

ty ill try a disk clean up if it works ill pm u my pass for my acc

Okay, I’ve never coded 500+ so it’s not my fault

Error occurred during initialization of VM
Means it couldn’t start up…

Could not reserve enough space for object heap

Could not make enough space for it.

Could not create the Java virtual machine.
Self explanatory.

‘server’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.
Self explanatory.

Try to fix it from there. Run a Disk Cleanup, etc. Clean out your comp.

And if that doesn’t work, just try a different 525.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2009, 06:24:42 pm[/size][hr]ty ill pm u my acc if it works

Read full topic

item.title: 525 help (run error) reward *
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[quote=“friendscapev3, post:4, topic:274074”][quote author=noobie22 link=topic=362145.msg2752922#msg2752922 date=1240013772]
Just take your 508 run.bat and replace the contents of your 508 run.bat into your 525 run.bat
[/quote]that is the dumbest ansewer in the world… maybe that works with dumb 317 but doesnt work with 525 or 508…[/quote]

Okay, I’ve never coded 500+ so it’s not my fault

Error occurred during initialization of VM
Means it couldn’t start up…

Could not reserve enough space for object heap

Could not make enough space for it.

Could not create the Java virtual machine.
Self explanatory.

‘server’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.
Self explanatory.

Try to fix it from there. Run a Disk Cleanup, etc. Clean out your comp.

And if that doesn’t work, just try a different 525.

Read full topic
